mapper.select: SELECT ppd.*,pp.,p. FROM production_plan_detail ppd INNER JOIN production_plan pp ON ppd.parent_id =pp.id LEFT JOIN product p ON ppd.`product_id`=p.`product_id` LEFT JOIN product_use pu ON pu.id=p.use_type WHERE manufacture_tag=0 and pp.check_tag=1

select ppd.*, pp.production_id as 'productionPlan.production_id' from production_plan_detail ppd inner join production_plan pp on ppd.parent_id =pp.id where pp.check_tag=1 and ppd.manufacture_tag=0 and ppd.product_id = #{product_id}

SELECT ppd.*,pu.useName,p.product_name,p.cost_price,p.real_cost_price,p.product_unit FROM production_plan_detail ppd LEFT JOIN product p ON ppd.`product_id`=p.`product_id` left join product_use pu on pu.id=p.use_type WHERE ppd.`parent_id`=#{parent_id}
